About.paragraph: SANAYL Textile Ltd is a family manufacturing business since the 1980s. Our company is devoted to investing in advanced and innovative technologies, we sketch our inspiration through the wide global arena and manufacture it under one roof. We continuously challenge the limitations when it comes to weaving and printing. Here at SANAYL, we manufacture fabrics customised based on customers’ specifications which are exclusively provided to them whereas our own range of fabrics are also available that anyone can order in bulk quantity. We provide excellent quality products and services manufactured with top quality material as SANAYL Textile’s motto has always been to furnish superior quality products and services to our customers.

Services.name: Fabrics manufacture & Supply
Services.text: We manufacture and supply (curtains, upholstery and wearing)  fabrics on custom based as per customer’s demand, which is exclusively provided to them.

Services.name: Own fabric designs
Services.text: We have warehousing of our own wide range of fabrics designs, manufactured and produced under one roof and readily available per roll bases.

Services.name: Events decor
Services.text: We provide stitched Jacquard (e.g. Damask style) table covers, chair covers and napkins, readily available in a huge range of designs and colours for event planners. We also produce custom make fabric designs as per customers’ demand and stitched them into products.
